400.title: Invalid Request
400.description: The information you provided is not correct. Please check and try again.

401.title: Login Required
401.description: You need to login to access this page. Please login or create a new account.

403.title: Access Denied
403.description: You do not have permission to view this page. Please contact support if you think this is a mistake.

404.title: Page Not Found
404.description: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.

405.title: Action Not Allowed
405.description: This action cannot be performed. Please try a different action.

408.title: Connection Slow
408.description: Your internet connection is slow or unstable. Please check your connection and try again.

409.title: Booking Conflict
409.description: This equipment is already booked for the selected time. Please choose a different time slot.

410.title: Equipment Unavailable
410.description: This equipment is no longer available. It may have been removed by the owner.

429.title: Too Many Attempts
429.description: You have made too many requests. Please wait a moment before trying again.

500.title: Something Went Wrong
500.description: We are experiencing technical difficulties. Our team is working to fix this. Please try again later.

50x.title: Service Unavailable
50x.description: Our service is temporarily unavailable due to maintenance or high traffic. We will be back soon.

offline.title: No Internet Connection
offline.description: You are currently offline. Please check your internet connection and try again.
offline.cachedDataHint: Some previously viewed content may still be available

slowConnection.title: Slow Connection Detected
slowConnection.description: Your internet connection is slow. We have optimized this page for better performance.
slowConnection.tip: For best experience, connect to a faster network

loginRequired.title: Login Required
loginRequired.description: Please login to access this feature. If you don't have an account, you can create one for free.

sessionExpired.title: Session Expired
sessionExpired.description: Your session has expired for security reasons. Please login again to continue.

otpFailed.title: Verification Failed
otpFailed.description: The verification code you entered is incorrect or has expired. Please try again.

accountSuspended.title: Account Suspended
accountSuspended.description: Your account has been temporarily suspended. Please contact our support team for assistance.

kycReview.title: Account Under Review
kycReview.description: Your account verification is in progress. This usually takes 24-48 hours. We will notify you once complete.

noEquipment.title: No Equipment Found
noEquipment.description: We couldn't find any equipment matching your search. Try adjusting your filters or search terms.
noEquipment.suggestions: Try searching for: Tractor, Harvester, Plough

noBookings.title: No Bookings Yet
noBookings.description: You haven't made any bookings yet. Start by exploring available equipment near you.

noNotifications.title: All Caught Up!
noNotifications.description: You have no new notifications. We'll notify you when there's something important.
noNotifications.tip: You'll receive notifications for bookings, payments, and messages

noReviews.title: No Reviews Yet
noReviews.description: This equipment hasn't been reviewed yet. Be the first to share your experience!

noAddresses.title: No Saved Addresses
noAddresses.description: You haven't saved any addresses yet. Add your address to make booking faster.

noSearchResults.title: No Results Found
noSearchResults.description: We couldn't find anything matching your search. Try different keywords or clear filters.
noSearchResults.tips:
Search Tips:
• Use simple keywords
• Check spelling
• Try broader terms

paymentSuccess.title: Payment Successful!
paymentSuccess.description: Your payment has been processed successfully. Your booking is confirmed.

paymentFailed.title: Payment Failed
paymentFailed.description: Your payment could not be processed. Please try again or use a different payment method.

bookingConfirmed.title: Booking Confirmed!
bookingConfirmed.description: Your booking has been confirmed. The equipment owner will contact you soon.

bookingCancelled.title: Booking Cancelled
bookingCancelled.description: Your booking has been cancelled successfully. If you paid, your refund will be processed soon.
bookingCancelled.refundInfo: Refund will be credited within 5-7 business days

refundInitiated.title: Refund Initiated
refundInitiated.description: Your refund has been initiated and will be credited to your account soon.
